discourse_list.title: The Schuppi and ElPro Delegate Happy Hour at EthCC -- Paris 2022, Episode 2

content.content: Extra, Extra! Read all about it! The Schuppi and ElPro Delegate Happy Hour in Pareeeeeeee 00:15 Beer tasting of the week: La Goude (Belgium  ) 01:40 Schuppi brought ElPro some gifts from Germany  04:12 Politicking and the happenings at MakerDAO 14:15 Interrupted by @hexonaut  15:50 Germany  versus USA   in futbòl  16:40 Interview with @tobalgarcia of the Growth CU 21:37 Interview at DAIVinity with Adam of @backed-finance 26:45 Few scenes from EthCC & DAIVinity
Thank you @flipflopflapdelegate ! DAIVinity was so fun, and meeting you f2f and doing the interview. Really appreciate it.

This was very interesting to watch,  and I really anticipate an episode 3 (would love to watch live).And I heard one of the presenters saying he’d get into trouble talking about security why is that ??

discourse_list.title: The Schuppi and ElPro Delegate Happy Hour post-EthCC \xe2\x80\x93 Paris 2022, Episode 3

content.content: Another Schuppi and ElPro Delegate Happy Hour featuring  02:00 - Beer Tasting (Holsten from Hamburg/Germany and Colberg from Kołobrzeg/Poland) 06:00 - @urbanisierung bringing a replacement drink 09:00 - ETH-CC recap 19:00 - some discussions about ChaosLabs 24:00 - KPIs and Budgets and technical difficulties    enjoy!
I also enjoyed this Episode with Corona Beer. You are just awesome
Rahii:  I also enjoyed this Episode with Corona Beer   Top kek. Indeed, most basic beers from Poland  taste like Corona (one of the least popular beers in New York City today).
GPT-discussion-categories: 3rd party giving entirely negative feedback on proposal

content.content: Actually I have started taking beer recently. I don’t know much about which beer is good or bad. So, could you suggest me some better ones.

not sure what is internationally available, but from the major german breweries I suggest  all from Holsten  if you like Weizen - Weihenstephan is a decent bavarian brewery, also Paulaner   Jever is also a pretty good pick

discourse_list.title: The Schuppi and ElPro Delegate Happy Hour -- Episode 1

content.content: The Schuppi & ElPro Delegate Happy Hour Motivation:  @ultraschuppi and I have been talking about doing a MakerDAO Delegate “Show” with a fun twist to it. Combining the test-tasting of World Beers (USA vs. Germany) with MakerDAO Governance happenings, we believe we can communicate and share our inner Delegate Platform thoughts. In the near future we want this “show” along with the Delegate Office Hours to provide a visual platform for MakerDAO Delegates, that cab communicate their platform core values, delegate statement, skillsets, and views. We intend to also invite Core Unit Team Members and their Facilitators @Core-Facilitators Truthfully, we can also call this “showcase” MEET THE MAKERS, as our intentions are to be communicative and add value to Decentralized Governance thinking from both CU Team Members and Delegates (Recognized, or Shadow). Please take a look at our first recording (recorded about an hour ago!) and let us know what you think. Critics are always Welcome!
content.GPT-summary: The post is about a proposed "show" called The Schuppi & ElPro Delegate Happy Hour, which aims to combine beer tasting with MakerDAO Governance discussions. The authors intend to invite Core Unit Team Members and their Facilitators to provide a visual platform for MakerDAO Delegates to communicate their platform core values, delegate statement, skillsets, and views. They have shared the first recording of the show and are asking for feedback and constructive criticism. They are also extending an invitation to collaborate and advertise the proposal.
